title: New: NAVVI â€“ Give Your Ghost
body:
Seattle duo **NAVVI** impressed with their two debut tracks earlier this year, and have now returned with new cut, _Give Your Ghost_.

A noticeable step-up, in terms of songwriting and production quality, particularly on the vocals which come across as far more assured. Check it out below.
